data.eml:eml: A review of Japanese species of Allophrys Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tersilochinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I. (2017): A review of Japanese species of Allophrys Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tersilochinae). Zootaxa 4221 (3): 386-392, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.250336
